Get entries filtered by log level

## Import

```ts
import { InMemorySink } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### level

`number`

- The log level to filter by (LogLevel.ERROR, LogLevel.INFO, etc.)

## Returns

`LogEntry[]`
Array of log entries matching the specified level
